name: Zoho Deluge
description: Online scripting language for automating business processes

opengraph.title: Next-generation programming | The fastest programming language for developers - Zoho Deluge
opengraph.description: Deluge is Zoho's online scripting language which is powered by guided scripting and a powerful built-in IDE. It's a one-stop solution for performing actions and integrations across the suite.
